attributes.additional_details:
The UK estimates there could be up to 2 million illegal immigrants living in the UK. Some are criminal's others turn to crime to fund there survival.
the British people have had enough and wish them all removed from the UK to there homeland.
attributes.background:
The British people want the removal of all illegal immigrants.
The housing of illegal people in the UK is in its own description illegal.
please help deport these unwanted burdens.
the tax payer will not pay anymore for these people.
